name: Repair Unit 0.1
description:
Repair Unit 0.1

This game demo was created for Indie Game Dev Beginners #003. GameJam theme: Robots.

Little repair machine loaded on unknown station. After boot and memory check it founds out that system files are corrupted and battery on low level.
Discover station to find resources end repair equipment. Watch out for battery charge.

Your goal is to repair!
Test Your Skills to make it to the next charging station!

Post your High Score in comments! Disclaimer

Charging station run intended to be difficult.

Credits

Developed by @mozokevgen
Assets by:

- https://www.kenney.nl/

Made with Defold Game Engine.
